title: A 'Selma moment' on policing? Plus, school satisfaction high despite pandemic woes
description: Chuck Todd talks about the top moments from Sunday's "Meet the Press"  including a discussion about police reform. Carrie Dann reports on the latest polling from parents with school-age children.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
